_header: If I were in my castel of Bungey
Subjects: Henry III; Bigot, Hugh; chronicles, verse in
_description: Hugh Bigot’s defiance of Henry III — a popular quatrain

BLHar1337.Transcription: yf I were in my castell of Bungeyvpon the water of WaveneyI wold not sett a button by the king of Eorkney
BLHar1337.Note: Four lines added to margin of Brut by a sixttenth-century hand.
